1.content: Phase 3B: Admin Dashboard - Help Assistant Management
1.details: Implement comprehensive FAQ management and escalated conversation review system based on provided architecture plan. This builds directly on Phase 3A UX enhancements.

2.content: Help Assistant Management - Phase 1: FAQ System Core
2.details:
1. Create AdminHelpAssistantPage component with tab navigation
2. Implement FAQManagementSection with CRUD operations
3. Create FAQTable with search, filtering, and pagination
4. Build FAQFormModal for create/edit functionality
5. Integrate with existing toast notification system from Phase 3A
6. Apply accessibility patterns from Phase 3A (focus traps, keyboard navigation)

3.content: Help Assistant Management - Phase 2: Escalated Conversations
3.details:
1. Implement EscalatedConversationsSection
2. Create ConversationTable with status/agent/date filters
3. Build ConversationDetailModal with transcript view
4. Add agent notes and status update functionality
5. Integrate with existing admin user management system
6. Apply Phase 3A loading states and error handling patterns

4.details:
1. Set up Zustand store for Help Assistant management
2. Implement TanStack Query for data fetching and caching
3. Create API endpoints for FAQ and conversation management
4. Add Axios interceptors for authentication
5. Implement optimistic updates using Phase 3A useOptimisticUpdate hook

5.details:
1. Add Help Assistant tab to existing admin sidebar navigation
2. Create navigation components following existing patterns
3. Integrate with existing admin layout structure
4. Ensure consistent styling with current admin interface
5. Update routing configuration

6.details:
1. Ensure WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across all new components
2. Apply Phase 3A accessibility patterns (focus management, ARIA labels)
3. Implement keyboard navigation for all interactive elements
4. Add screen reader support for dynamic content updates
5. Test with assistive technologies

7.details:
1. Link escalated conversations to user management system
2. Integrate FAQ content with event-related questions
3. Connect notification system for conversation escalations
4. Ensure data consistency across admin modules
5. Test integration points thoroughly

8.details:
1. Manual testing of all Help Assistant features
2. Integration testing with existing admin functionality
3. Accessibility testing across different user scenarios
4. Performance testing with realistic data volumes
5. Deploy to production environment
6. Create comprehensive testing documentation

9.details:
1. Update admin user guides with Help Assistant features
2. Create API documentation for new endpoints
3. Document component architecture and design patterns
4. Update project roadmap for future phases
5. Create maintenance and troubleshooting guides

10.content: Phase 3C: Admin Dashboard - Accessibility Audit Review System
10.details: Implement comprehensive accessibility audit monitoring system following the provided architecture plan. This builds directly on Phase 3A and 3B foundations to provide automated WCAG compliance monitoring and issue management.

11.details: Successfully implemented core accessibility audit dashboard with WCAG compliance metrics, issue categorization, and summary analytics. Deployed at https://rteyghfhjrrd8.space.minimax.io/admin/accessibility-audit with full CRUD functionality and comprehensive documentation.

12.details: Successfully implemented advanced filtering and issue management features including multi-criteria filtering, filter presets, bulk operations, enhanced issue detail modals with tabs, team management, and progress tracking. Deployed at https://1dnr11xqb8pk.space.minimax.io with comprehensive verification and documentation.

13.details: Successfully implemented automated accessibility testing tools integration, scheduled audit processes, and advanced analytics dashboard with CI/CD pipeline integration. Deployed at https://pjx494k05r46.space.minimax.io with comprehensive features including Analytics Dashboard, Automated Testing, Scheduled Audits, and Quality Gates.

14.details:
1. Research and integrate accessibility testing libraries (axe-core, etc.)
2. Set up automated WCAG compliance scanning workflows
3. Implement manual accessibility testing guidelines and processes
4. Create accessibility testing training materials for development team
5. Establish accessibility quality gates for development workflow
6. Set up continuous accessibility monitoring in production

15.details:
1. Create comprehensive accessibility audit user documentation
2. Document accessibility development guidelines and best practices
3. Train admin team on accessibility audit review processes
4. Create accessibility compliance reporting templates and workflows
5. Establish accessibility improvement processes and escalation procedures
6. Document integration points with existing admin features (Help Assistant, User Management)

16.content: Phase 3D: Donation Portal & Payment System Analysis
16.details: Analyze and plan comprehensive donation management system with Stripe payment processing, donor management, and administrative oversight. Includes revenue generation, security compliance, and community engagement features.

17.details: Successfully implemented Stripe Payment Intents API integration, secure webhook endpoints, donation form frontend, and database schema for donation tracking. Deployed at https://35a49r8q3n1o.space.minimax.io/donate with full PCI-compliant payment processing. Comprehensive documentation and testing guides provided.

18.details: Build donation management dashboard with real-time monitoring, transaction history, donor management tools, financial reporting, and analytics. Integrate with existing admin interface patterns.

19.details: Implement recurring donations, donor history, tax documentation, receipt management, and advanced donor segmentation. Include automated workflows for donor communication and impact reporting.

20.details: Successfully implemented complete membership management system with Stripe subscription integration, three membership tiers (Student $0, Individual $50, Family $150), family member management, and admin analytics dashboard. Deployed at https://3yfw1fsoobj2.space.minimax.io with comprehensive documentation and testing procedures.

21.content: Phase 3E.2: Membership Structure Update - Single Tier Model
21.details: Successfully updated membership system from 3-tier to single tier model: $360/year Individual membership with dual payment options (payment OR 30 hours volunteering). Updated database schema, Stripe integration, member dashboard, and admin interface. Deployed at https://f06lxqd7vgpw.space.minimax.io with comprehensive testing documentation.

22.details: FIXED: Resolved missing volunteer portal section in member dashboard. Issue was API only returning 'active' subscriptions but volunteer memberships start as 'pending' status. Updated edge function to handle both active and pending subscriptions. All volunteer features now visible and functional on member dashboard.

23.details: COMPLETE: Transformed ISSB Portal from generic appearance to modern, premium SaaS interface incorporating beautiful green button design from reference image. Implemented Material Green (#4CAF50) color scheme, Inter typography, comprehensive design system, smooth transitions, and refined components. All core pages redesigned with professional appearance. Deployed at https://zeqv226knuy6.space.minimax.io with complete documentation.
